metadata.name: Forge Pass 1
metadata.description: The Forge Pass is a mint pass for BILT projects. Each pass can mint up to three NFTs from eligible collections into BILT versions that compliment the original NFTs. The original NFT is never touched in the process. To redeem the Forge Pass for the third and final time, the pass must be burned. Must own the original NFT to mint a BILT version.
